snippet.title: Lily-Rose Depp Hurries Home To Support Father During Divorce
snippet.description:
Thursday, May 26, 2016: Lily-Rose Depp rushed through LAX, hurrying home to support her father Johnny Depp, after Amber Heard files for divorce, following only 15 months of marriage.  X17online.com

snippet.title: Mansfield parents in plea for missing Amber Peat
snippet.description:
The parents of a 13-year-old girl who has been missing for nearly three days have pleaded with her to get in touch.

Amber Peat was last seen at home in Mansfield in Nottinghamshire at 17:30 BST on Saturday.

At a press conference, her mother and stepfather said Amber's disappearance, from her home in Bosworth Street, was "completely out of character".

Fighting back tears, Kelly and Danny Peat said: "We just want to know she is okay."

Up to 300 people were involved in a search for Amber on Monday, with posters being placed in many houses and shops.
'Brilliant holiday'

"We just want her, or someone who knows where she is, to get in touch," Mr and Mrs Peat added.

Supt Matthew McFarlane, of Nottinghamshire Police, said they had had few leads in the inquiry, but a "full-scale effort" to find her was under way.

Mr Peat said: "We had just all had a brilliant holiday. It's just not right.

She had a fantastic time, never stopped laughing with all of us together."

Mrs Peat said "nothing else happened" that would lead to Amber leaving, apart from a disagreement over chores.
'No confirmed sightings'

She added: "I was upstairs and I heard a door bang.

"I went downstairs and she wasn't around, so I looked outside and she was nowhere."

They confirmed Amber had left without her mobile phone or any money.

Supt McFarlane said: "We've been involved in searching the area, and friends and family have also assisted with that.

"We've been speaking to all of her friends, all the inquiries through the school, through family, through anybody who may possibly know or have heard from her over the last three days.

"Unfortunately, we're here today because we have not had any confirmed sightings of her."

Amber Laura Heard is an American film and television actress. After a series of small roles in film and television, Heard had her first starring role in the horror film All the Boys Love Mandy Lane. Wikipedia

Born: 22 April 1986 (age 35 years), Austin, Texas, United States

Height: 1.7 m

Spouse: Johnny Depp (m. 2015–2017)

Children: Oonagh Paige Heard

Parents: David Heard, Paige Parsons

snippet.description:

郭采潔-《2.Oak（二月的橡樹）》【網易音樂人】《親愛的我-女性主題合輯企劃》
网易云音乐：http://music.163.com/song/1903654107/?userid=3320283321 
2.Oak（伴奏）：https://music.163.com/#/song?id=1908067080
spotify：https://open.spotify.com/track/3zrdk8v43S1EcpW8n8XQLE?fbclid=IwAR1UdklROK_horzMI0bzLyYMIziLPboebRHjs2gzRuupFUqNR3RJHB_sMzI
bandcamp：https://amberkuo.bandcamp.com/track/2-oak
soundcloud：https://soundcloud.com/nomadcityrecords/2oak
youtube：https://youtu.be/ipRtrgPRkl8
apple music：https://music.apple.com/jp/album/_/1599457736?i=1599458056&mt=1&app=music&ls=1

2.Oak #二月的橡树 #郭采潔 #郭采洁
一顆堅硬的石頭在急流裏，像一座島。
我將終其一生書寫生命，以我的名 。
12月25日0點，網易音樂人·女性主題合輯企劃第2季 #親愛的我
收官單曲 @郭采潔 《2.Oak（#二月的橡樹）》
在網易雲音樂上線

專輯介紹：網易音樂人·女性主題合輯企劃「親愛的我」收官單曲解鎖！
https://music.163.com/#/album?id=138203923
歌手：Sunnee杨芸晴 / 春晓 / 刘忻 / 苏诗丁 / 杨默依Moi / 祁紫檀 / 郭采洁

郭采潔《2.Oak》 “No eye has seen In the name of me ”
你是一顆堅硬的石頭
甘願為人惦上一腳 看得更好
一顆堅硬的石頭在急流裡
像一座島

噢 其實你是一棵樹
長了滿頭禮物

小石頭
在路上開過
和風一起作用。

曾經隨意的看到一幅隨手畫
上頭寫著：
today I’m going to be a girl,
tomorrow I will be a boy.
一根蘿蔔奮力的從地裡向艷陽奔去⋯

2.Oak
一篇以野性生長為命題的禱文
一首
誕生卻含著遺憾的哀歌
然而
世界要人堅硬
一切的機會，為成全生命

以自己的名
以自己的名
重寫一首慶祝誕生的歌曲

導語：「親愛的我」是網易音樂人發起女性合輯企劃第2季，邀請春曉、郭采潔、劉忻、祁紫檀、Sunnee楊蕓晴、蘇詩丁、楊默依7位女性音樂人，一起通過音樂來關註那個最親愛的、卻常常被忽略的自我。這或許不是最好的我，卻是命運般的最親愛的我。希望每個女孩都能在音樂中獲得力量，更加了解自己、接納自己、學會愛自己。每一個「我」，都是最值得被愛的人~

delicatebirdak：在這首歌的簡介里，我寫了一個蘿蔔奮力地從地里向艷陽奔去。這個奮力的蘿卜，就是最開始對於這次創作的畫面，有一股特別強壯的力量。

Parents are the pride of their children
I was called to one hope when I was born
Possibility, opportunity
Those are the air I breathe to live
You don’t know me
You don’t know
A discerning heart
A discerning rock
Don’t you know how good is a timely word
How good is a timely word
Say,
You love me,Ginty my love
You love me
No eye has seen
In the name of me
No ear has heard
In the name of me, No
No mind has conceived
In the name of me
In the name of me
It takes a life-long to end a story

Fourteen years on Christmas,
2021/12/25
Amber Kuo brings to the season a new work: 
2.Oak 
A hymn to celebrate the birth of her own name; the oak of February, thick or thin, is strong and stable, full of spiritual respect. 
A prayer with the proposition of wild growth
Born with a sad song 
However
The world is hard
All opportunities for the fulfillment of life

作詞 : 郭采潔
作曲 : Yider（伊德爾）
編曲 : Yider（伊德爾）/Asr(阿斯爾)
制作人：伊德爾 Yider/郭采潔 AK
出品：網易喜雨
編曲：伊德爾 Yider/ 阿斯爾 Asr
監制：姚政
企劃：黨鈺林
鍵盤：阿斯爾 Asr
人聲編輯：陳緣
混音：：一丁
母帶：一丁
封面繪畫藝術家：大村
封面設計：陳欣妤Xavia Chen
2.Oak二月的*橡樹音樂影像 導演 @陈奕飞陈 阿飛

本歌曲來自【網易音樂人】《親愛的我-女性主題合輯企劃》

All opportunities for the fulfillment of life

作曲 : Yider（伊德爾）
編曲 : Yider（伊德爾）/Asr(阿斯爾)

母帶：一丁
封面繪畫藝術家：大村
封面設計：陳欣妤Xavia Chen
2.Oak二月的*橡樹音樂影像 導演 @陈奕飞陈 阿飛

snippet.title: ✅  Amber Heard : sa nouvelle compagne se bat contre le cancer
snippet.description:
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVBZ7bN9BPx3LkMkWSMQL1g?sub_confirmation=1
✍ Après sa relation avec Elon Musk ou encore son divorce très médiatisé et houleux de Johnny Depp, Amber Heard n'est plus un cœur à prendre.  Ce dimanche 12 janvier, l'actrice a été pris en flagrant délit devant un hôtel de Palm Springs, dans les bras d'une certaine Bianca Butti.  Les deux femmes ont échangé plusieurs baisers pour le plus grand bonheur des photographes.  Un début d'idylle au beau fixe à un détail près. Ce mardi 14 janvier, le Daily Maila révélé que Bianca Butti, une réalisatrice âgée de 38 ans et vivant à Los Angeles, se bat contre un cancer du sein.  .La maladie lui aurait été diagnostiquée pour la première fois en 2015, comme elle le documente le compte Instagram Bianca Beats It.  Page sur laquelle elle raconte sa lutte acharnée pour sa santé. Le cancer serait revenu en mars 2019.  "J'étais plus que dévastée. Une nouvelle tumeur est apparue dans mon sein droit", a confié la cinéaste sur le réseau social.  Ce terrible diagnostic était tombé trois ans après une première  ...
💖 #couple, #Cancer, #Santé, #amour
